Search Search Search ﻿ Paul Davidsson Professor paul.davidsson@mau.se +46 40 665 86 18 orcid.org/0000-0003-0998-6585 Employed at Faculty of Technology and Society Department of Computer Science and Media Technology Research subject Computer Sciences Presentation My research focuses on the application of IT to areas important for the society. Currently I am involved in research projects concerning energy efficiency of transport and energy systems, as well as for supporting decision-making and collaboration. My main expertise is in the areas of artificial intelligence, Internet of Things (IoT), simulation, and data mining. I am the director of the Sustainable Digitalisation Research Centre.
